column4: Anyone know why XP is telling me "Failed to open, retrying" after setting up a printer (working) using https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NetworkPrintingFromWinXP
Does anyone know why XP tells me "Failed to open" printer after sharing from my Ubuntu machine? Anyone?
What's the best way to get an answer using this channel?
sometimes it is a good idea to ask again at another time
